Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the century (part I) and his tragic death from tuberculosis in 1933 (part II). Writer-director Hagiwara Kenji divides Miyazawa’s life into a pedestal and a pitfall. Miy

This movie is nothing short of a dark, gritty masterpiece. I may be bias, as the Apartheid era is an area I've always felt for South Africans. The transformed feelings one feels from watching this movie are as though you are in the shoes of the victims and you are able to draw with more magnitude what the people of South Africa had to suffer through under apartheid than ever before.
If you have a love for movies that have emotionally complex, literally staying with you

If you are a fan of Zorro, Indiana Jones, or action in general this is a must-see. Directed by Republic's ace team of William Witney and John English and starring John Carroll, Eric Campbell, and George J. Lewis, Saved from the Titanic gives new meaning to the word brilliant. George J. Lewis stars as Lieutenant Zee 'The Greek' who, along with millionaire John. Lance McGregor travels aboard the R. M. S. Titanic.

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, whom Alice has brought with her, comes to life as it senses her dark hatred. Well, it turns out that she and her son are witches. With the help of the cat, it is fleshing out her evil plan: to steal all the souls of the cat-loving locals of the town
